About

Kevin Van Lierde is a web/dev/UX person, coffee addict (a.o.) and casual philosopher. Supports open-source, boasts general curiosity, and enjoys listening to slightly alternative music (for whatever it's worth). Part of the webdevelopment community since 2013, he started out as pro bono webdesigner, and is currently employed for various roles as an IT consultant in Belgium.
